channel.title: 562 rs2hd barrow chest
channel.description: I have fully working spade and sarcophagus working but I want it so that when you kill all the barrows they drop a key and when you have the 5th key, it will tele you and allow you to fight for the 6th and then click on the chest which will delete all the keys and give random reward (barrows kind of rare)
